column4: hello, i enter some text using editor "pico" (in terminal) which is a one long line, i save it and exit pico. then i open the file again and the line is seperated into two lines. why does it do that? and how could i make him not to? thanks
Does the first line have a funny added character at the end..
No, the line is like "....RxwnqYZ..." and the seperation happens after "..Rx" the second line starts with "wnq..."
HAve not used pico, so no idea why it is doing that
